## useInterval() function

Let callback automatically run with specified time interval

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useInterval(callback: EventCallback<[]>, initialDelay?: number): IntervalAPI;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | [EventCallback](./react-hooks.eventcallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;\[\]&gt; | callback to run |
|  initialDelay | number | <i>(Optional)</i> delay to start interval on hook mount |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IntervalAPI](./react-hooks.intervalapi.md)

interval API
